FuncDef: The reset ip ipv6-prefix command resets the statistics of the specified IPv6 prefix list. If ipv6-prefix-name is not specified, you can reset the statistics of all the IPv6 prefix lists.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the IPv6 prefix list.
The name is a string of 1 to 169 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To reset timers in permit and deny modes of an IPv6 prefix list, run the reset ip ipv6-prefix command.
